summary: An Armor Bandage Actualy made based on UNP body. Inspired by sanosuke character in samurai X but i make it with female version. I hope You Enjoy
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s25.postimg.org/9e0w507sf/Header.jpg[/img]
i'm Indonesian and i'm sorry for my truly bad english or miss type. :D
this is my second mod after [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59685/?]Indonesian Uniform UNP[/url]
i'm so sorry for bad texture and bad model.

-
An Armor Bandage Actualy made based on UNP body.
Inspired by sanosuke character with full bandage in samurai X, i make it with female version

- How To Get -
You can get by code just type help "nirwana".
or Craft them in forge under leather category.

- Issue -
Acctualy weight slider didn't support. when i try to make weight slider version there are so many glitch so i think weight 0 is best suit :P
there some small cliping area in vest and skirt under exterime animation i think isn't big problem

Credit
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3076419/?]Nightasy[/url] again for awesome tuttorial
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675/?]Dimon99[/url] for Dimonized UNP body
Kaskus Family, Actualy Yeah.Dudeees, M.a.c.h.o.k, nafis399, hore33[/center]
author: sakumz
